section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: In 68 Original and 69 Original, 68 is Pennsylvania against New Jersey; 69, Maine against New Hampshire, the motions of each of the states for leave to file bills of complaint in these original jurisdiction cases are denied.
Mr. Justice Blackmun filed a concurring opinion; Mr. Justice Brennan and Mr. Justice White would grant leave to file close bills of complaint.
Mr. Justice Powell and Mr. Justice Stevens took no part in either the consideration or the decisions of these cases.
